BOOK TRIAL CLASS Weekly Schedule Zurich Altstetten â€¢ English Taught Start Wednesday Thursday 18:30 NEW Bachata Bachata Beginner 0 with Ale y Alexia Bachata Bachata Beginner 2 with Ale y Alexia 19:30 Sensual Style Bachata Sensual Foundation with Ale y Xidan Styling Open Level Lady Style with Xidan 20:30 Sensual Style Bachata Sensual Improver with Ale y Xidan Sensual Style Bachata Sensual Intermediate/Advanced with Ale y Xidan * Instructor approval required Wednesday NEW 18:30 Bachata Beginner 0 19:30 Bachata Sensual Foundation (Sensual Style) 20:30 Bachata Sensual Improver (Sensual Style) Thursday 18:30 Bachata Beginner 2 19:30 Open Level Lady Style (Styling) 20:30 Bachata Sensual Intermediate/Advanced (Sensual Style) * Instructor approval required Your Dance Journey This is an overview of a dancer's journey with AXcent. We divide classes by what you should be taking (Core) and what would be a good complimentary addition. Remember that each journey belongs to you. Please talk to us to know what is the best class for you! The Start Your friendly introduction to Bachata. # Page: About Us (about.html)

About Us | AXcent Dance Zurich AXCENT DANCE About us Schedule Registration Events Contact Log In --> More â–¾ Room Rental Collaborations Corporate Events Wedding Dance Private Lessons Gallery Education Beginner Guide Blog FAQ Dance Etiquette Book Free Trial AXcent Team Who We Are Passion, Technique, and Community. Our Global Footprint We are honored to have been invited to teach and share our passion with dance communities across the globe. 25+ Cities 12 Countries 400+ International Dancers Reached âˆž Memories THE FOUNDERS Ale y Xidan We are Alessandro and Xidan, the founders of AXcent Dance. Our journey began with a shared passion for Bachata Sensual and a vision to create a dance school that goes beyond just teaching steps. We believe in building a community where everyone feels welcome, supported, and inspired to express themselves. As International Artists We have shared our passion in over 12 countries. We are also proud to serve as official judges for the Swiss Championship IDO and are active event organizers, dedicated to elevating the dance community. Our Philosophy Our teaching methodology is built on a strong foundation of technique, musicality, and connection. We don't just teach you what to do, but how to do it with style and fluidity. We draw inspiration from various dance styles to create a unique and modern approach to Bachata. CONNECTING THE COMMUNITY Curating World-Class Experiences Beyond the studio, we strive to create exceptional dance experiences. From curating Zurich's largest Dominican event to co-organizing one of Italy's most prestigious congresses, we bring the community together with passion. DOMINICAN BACHATA INTENSIVE BOOTCAMP Zurich's Premier Dominican Event We host the biggest Dominican event in Zurich , creating a home for authentic culture and music in the heart of Switzerland. INTERNATIONAL CONGRESS Milano Sensual Congress Co-organizers of one of Italy's top Bachata Sensual congresses. Top World Artists â€¢ 4.5 Star Luxury Hotel AXCENT DANCE Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten 2 minute walking from Tram 2 stop and Bus 31 stop Quick Links Bachata in Zurich Wedding Dance Private Lessons Legal Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Imprint Find Us &copy; 2025 AXcent Dance. All rights reserved.

# Page: Private Lessons (private-lessons.html)

Private Lessons | AXcent Dance Zurich AXCENT DANCE About us Schedule Registration Events Contact Log In --> More â–¾ Room Rental Collaborations Corporate Events Wedding Dance Private Lessons Gallery Education Beginner Guide Blog FAQ Dance Etiquette Book Free Trial PERSONAL COACHING PRIVATE LESSONS Fast-track your progress with 1-on-1 coaching tailored specifically to your unique goals and learning style. CONTACT US Why Go Private? Unlock your full potential with personalized attention. ðŸš€ Accelerated Learning One hour of private coaching can be worth weeks of group classes. We focus 100% on you, speeding up your muscle memory and understanding. ðŸ’Ž Detail & Styling Refine your movement quality. We dive deep into micro-movements, musicality, and styling that transform you from a good dancer to a great one. ðŸŽ¯ Custom Goals Whether you want to master the fundamentals, learn "that move you saw online", or refine your basic step and stylingâ€”we build the entire session around your personal goals. FAQs Do I need a dance partner? + No partner required! Our instructors will dance with you, allowing you to focus purely on your own technique and leading/following skills. Can we prepare a Wedding Dance? + Absolutely. We specialize in creating beautiful, memorable wedding choreographies that match your song and skill level. Visit our Wedding Dance page for more details. What should I wear? + Comfortable clothing that allows movement. For shoes, standard dance shoes or clean indoor sneakers are best. Avoid heavy boots or flip-flops. How much does it cost? + We will discuss the investment personally with you. Please fill out the contact form , and we will get back to you via WhatsApp or Email. Where do the lessons take place? + All private lessons are held at our home base: AXcent Dance Studio (Hermetschloostrasse 73, Zurich). AXCENT DANCE Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten 2 minute walking from Tram 2 stop and Bus 31 stop Quick Links Bachata in Zurich Wedding Dance Private Lessons Legal Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Imprint Find Us &copy; 2025 AXcent Dance. # Page: Wedding Dance (wedding-dance.html)

Wedding Dance Choreography | AXcent Dance Zurich AXCENT DANCE About us Schedule Registration Events Contact Log In --> More â–¾ Room Rental Collaborations Corporate Events Wedding Dance Private Lessons Gallery Education Beginner Guide Blog FAQ Dance Etiquette Book Free Trial YOUR SPECIAL MOMENT YOUR FIRST DANCE, PERFECTED Choreography that tells your love story. From elegant waltzes to sensual Bachata, we create a dance that feels uniquely yours . BOOK CONSULTATION Why Choose AXcent? Your wedding dance shouldn't be stressful. It should be a moment of connection and joy. Whether you have "two left feet" or are experienced dancers, we guide you every step of the way. â™¥ Tailored to You We choreograph to your chosen song and adapt the moves to your comfort level and dress. â™¥ Any Style Dreaming of a romantic Bachata? A fiery Salsa? Or a classic slow dance? We do it all. â™¥ Stress-Free Learning Private lessons in a relaxed atmosphere. We make sure you feel confident on the big day. The Process 01 Consultation We meet (online or in person) to discuss your vision, listen to your song, and understand your dance floor size and dress constraints. 02 Creation Our instructors create a custom choreography that highlights your strengths and fits the music perfectly. 03 Rehearsal Step-by-step private lessons in person at our studio. We film the steps so you can practice at home. We focus on connection and looking natural. # Page: Bachata Beginner 0 (class-bachata-beginner-0.html)

Beginner Bachata Classes Zurich | Level 0 | AXcent Dance AXCENT DANCE About us Schedule Registration Events Contact Log In --> More â–¾ Room Rental Collaborations Corporate Events Wedding Dance Private Lessons Gallery Education Beginner Guide Blog FAQ Dance Etiquette Book Free Trial NEVER DANCED BEFORE Bachata Beginner 0 Your first steps into the world of Bachata. Learn the basics, meet new people, and discover the joy of social dancing in a relaxed, fun environment. Day & Time Wednesdays 18:30 Location AXcent Dance Studio Level New to dancing What to Expect This course is designed for absolute beginners who have never danced before or want to refresh their basics. We start from zero, focusing on rhythm, basic steps, and simple turns. Our goal is to make you feel comfortable on the dance floor as quickly as possible. You don't need a partner to join! We rotate partners during class, which is the best way to learn leading and following (and to make new friends!). What You Will Learn Basic Step & Rhythm Right & Left Turns Basic Partner Connection Simple Combinations Musicality Basics Prerequisites None! Just bring comfortable shoes and a smile. ðŸ«¶ No Ego, Just Fun We are here to support each other. Mistakes are part of the fun! Check out our guide to start with the right mindset. Read Beginner Guide â†’ Ready to start? Join us for a trial class or sign up for the full course. BOOK FREE TRIAL REGISTER NOW AXCENT DANCE Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten 2 minute walking from Tram 2 stop and Bus 31 stop Quick Links Bachata in Zurich Wedding Dance Private Lessons Legal Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Imprint Find Us &copy; 2025 AXcent Dance. All rights reserved.

# Page: Bachata Sensual Foundation (class-bachata-sensual-foundation.html)

Bachata Sensual Foundation | AXcent Dance Zurich AXCENT DANCE About us Schedule Registration Events Contact Log In --> More â–¾ Room Rental Collaborations Corporate Events Wedding Dance Private Lessons Gallery Education Beginner Guide Blog FAQ Dance Etiquette Book Free Trial FOUNDATION Bachata Sensual Foundation Dive into the world of Bachata Sensual. This course focuses on the essential techniques of body movement, isolation, and smooth connection that define this style. Day & Time Wednesdays 19:30 Location AXcent Dance Studio Level 6 Months - 1 Year What to Expect Bachata Sensual is structured around 10 Fundamental Techniques . The objective of this course is to rotate through these 10 fundamentals, ensuring you build the absolute best foundation for social dancing. We introduce body waves, isolations, and circular movements with a strong emphasis on safety and technique. This course is essential for everyone, even for reviewing. These techniques are strictly required for higher levels and will not be explained in detail in later classes â€”only here. What You Will Learn Body Waves & Rolls Basic Isolations (Chest, Hips) Sensual Frame & Connection Circular Movements Musicality & Timing Prerequisites Completion of Beginner 0-2 or equivalent experience (approx. 6 months of lessons , not social dancing). You should be comfortable with the basic step and basic turns. Ready to level up? Join us for a trial class or sign up for the full course. BOOK FREE TRIAL REGISTER NOW AXCENT DANCE Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten 2 minute walking from Tram 2 stop and Bus 31 stop Quick Links Bachata in Zurich Wedding Dance Private Lessons Legal Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Imprint Find Us &copy; 2025 AXcent Dance. All rights reserved.

---

# Page: Beginner Guide (beginner-guide.html)

Beginner Guide: Your First Bachata Class | AXcent Dance Zurich AXCENT DANCE About us Schedule Registration Events Contact Log In --> More â–¾ Room Rental Collaborations Corporate Events Wedding Dance Private Lessons Gallery Education Beginner Guide Blog FAQ Dance Etiquette Book Free Trial Beginner Resources YOUR FIRST CLASS Everything you need to know to feel confident on the dance floor. From what to wear to how to connect. What to Expect Dance Shoes Roles Etiquette What to Expect Walking into a dance studio for the first time can be intimidating, but at AXcent Dance, we make it easy. What to Wear Comfort is key! Wear clothes that allow you to move freely. Gym clothes, leggings, or casual wear like jeans are fine. Avoid anything too restrictive. Read Full Guide â†’ Partner Rotation In our classes, we highly suggest rotating partners . It helps you learn faster and meet new people. If you prefer to stay with your own partner, we respect that choice. Shoe Guide Having the right tools makes a huge difference. Protect your knees and turn smoothly. Not Recommended Street Shoes Dirty soles damage the studio floor. Please always bring a separate pair of clean indoor shoes . Great Start Comfortable Sneakers Perfect for your first class! Any comfortable indoor sneaker works. Pro Choice Dance Sneakers There are brands specialized in sneaker dancing shoes. These are highly recommended for leaders and followers. Ask us for a promo code. Roles Bachata is a conversation between two people. Leader Guides the dance and suggests moves. They are responsible for navigation and safety. Follower Interprets the signals and adds their own style. Nowadays anyone is welcome to choose either role. Etiquette & Hygiene Dancing is a close-contact activity. Please be mindful of your hygiene. Fresh breath (mints are great!), deodorant, and a fresh shirt go a long way. Please no chewing gum for safety and respect for teachers and other attendants. AXCENT DANCE Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten 2 minute walking from Tram 2 stop and Bus 31 stop Find Us Quick Links Bachata in Zurich Wedding Dance Private Lessons Legal Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Imprint &copy; 2025 AXcent Dance. All rights reserved.

---

# Page: Dance Etiquette (etiquette.html)

Dance Etiquette | AXcent Dance Zurich AXCENT DANCE About us Schedule Registration Events Contact Log In --> More â–¾ Room Rental Collaborations Corporate Events Wedding Dance Private Lessons Gallery Education Beginner Guide Blog FAQ Dance Etiquette Book Free Trial COMMUNITY GUIDELINES Dance Floor Etiquette Respect, hygiene, and kindness make the dance floor a better place for everyone. The Golden Rules ðŸ¤ Asking for a Dance Anyone can ask! Be polite, make eye contact, and extend your hand. Accept a "No" gracefully. ðŸš¿ Hygiene Matters Fresh breath and deodorant are musts. Bring a spare shirt if needed. Your partner will thank you! ðŸ™ Saying Thank You Always thank your partner at the end of the dance. It shows appreciation for the shared moment. ðŸ›‘ Respect Boundaries If a partner prefers a open hold or more distance, respect it immediately without question. ðŸ•Šï¸ Be Gentle Lead and follow with care. Never force a move or grip too tightly. Safety comes first. On the Dance Floor ðŸ‘€ Floorcraft Watch out for others. Avoid big moves on a crowded floor and protect your partner from collisions. ðŸŽ“ No Teaching Unless asked, don't teach on the social floor. Focus on connecting and having fun, not perfection. ðŸ˜Š Smile & Connect Connection beats complexity. Relax, listen to the music, and enjoy the dance. A smile goes a long way! ðŸš« No Aerials Lifts and aerials are for shows, not the social floor. Keep your feet on the ground for safety. ðŸ‘£ Small Steps When the floor is packed, keep your steps small and under your body to save space. Class Rules ðŸ¬ No Chewing Gum For safety reasons, please dispose of chewing gum before class starts. ðŸ¤« Let the Teacher Teach Please don't correct other students. If you see an issue, focus on your own dancing. âš¡ Stay Active If you are tired, take a break outside the line. Sitting in class lowers the energy of the group. ðŸ™‹ Ask Questions Properly Don't step into the middle to ask. Please raise your hand and wait for the teacher. â° Be Punctual Arrive on time to warm up properly and not miss important initial instructions. AXCENT DANCE Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten 2 minute walking from Tram 2 stop and Bus 31 stop Quick Links Bachata in Zurich Wedding Dance Private Lessons Legal Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Imprint Find Us &copy; 2025 AXcent Dance. All rights reserved.

# Page: FAQ (faq.html)

FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions | AXcent Dance Zurich AXCENT DANCE About us Schedule Registration Events Contact Log In --> More â–¾ Room Rental Collaborations Corporate Events Wedding Dance Private Lessons Gallery Education Beginner Guide Blog FAQ Dance Etiquette Book Free Trial COMMON QUESTIONS FAQ Everything you need to know before your first class. Do I need a partner to join? No, you don't need a partner! We rotate partners frequently during class. This is the best way to learn how to lead and follow different people, and it's a great way to make new friends. Of course, if you come with a partner and prefer to stay together, that is also allowed. What should I wear? Wear comfortable clothing that allows you to move freely. For shoes, we recommend dance shoes or sneakers with a smooth sole that allows you to turn easily. Avoid heavy boots or shoes with too much grip. Read our full "What to Wear" guide here. I have never danced before. Can I join? Absolutely! Our Beginner 0 courses are designed specifically for people with no prior dance experience. We start from the very basics and guide you step-by-step. How do I pay for classes? We accept payments via Twint, Cash, or Bank Transfer. You can pay for a single drop-in class, a 10-class pass, or sign up for a monthly subscription for the best value. Is there parking available? Yes, there are public parking spots available nearby (Blue Zone) and a parking garage at the Letzipark shopping center, which is a short walk away. We are also easily accessible by public transport (Tram 2, Bus 31). What if I miss a class? If you have a subscription or a class pass, please let us know in advance if you cannot make it. Depending on availability, you might be able to make up the class on another day of the same week, but please check with us first. AXCENT DANCE Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten 2 minute walking from Tram 2 stop and Bus 31 stop Quick Links Bachata in Zurich Wedding Dance Private Lessons Legal Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Imprint Find Us &copy; 2025 AXcent Dance. All rights reserved.
